summary: My first Upload on Skyrim Nexus...
descriptionHtml:
[u]Audrienne -  Breton Girl[/u]

I tried to recreate one of my favorite chars from Oblivion but ended up with something completly new. However I am quite satisfied with the result, so I want to share it with the community. :)

This is my first upload at Skyrim Nexus and I hope to make not too many mistakes and break noones computer in the process. ;)
 
Constructive feedback is welcome.

The 7z-File contains two savegames, one at the beginning of the tutorial in Helgen Keep right after you get your controls from the game, the second one is a bit later in Riverwood shortly after the tutorial ended.

You need the following files to get the same look (all on Nexus):

CBBE 3.3 with activated face pack 2666
CBBE Female Texture Replacer NMM Installer 4686
Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide TBBP  (see mods page for required additional mods) 25259
OblivionHairPackAIO 22598
More Hair Colors Updated for Dawnguard 27755

If the hair is missing after loading the game you have to use showracemenu to get it back. 

I use quite a few mods for my Skyrim, if you want to avoid problems with your mod-setup it might be a good idea to load the face on your own char via SkyrimFaceTransfer 15307.

Audrienne is almost complete, but there a few minor problems left with her cheeks I can´t get rid off (a bit jagged if you look from certain angles) . If anyone can fix that better than me - be my guest. :)

Installation: Drop the files in your Skyrim saves folder under C:\users\username\documents\my games\Skyrim

Update 13.09.2014 - LittleFighter created a (slightly different) preset for Audrienne - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58054/?

I recommend using this if you have loading or saving problems with my savegames and don´t want to use SkyrimFaceTransfer.

Update 14.09.2014 - after some problems were cleared version 0.1 of Audrienne Follower Mod is online -> http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58129/?
author: Dennis055
